name: Algebra
description: A comprehensive introduction to algebraic concepts and operations.

name: Biology
description: An exploration of living organisms and life processes.

name: Programming Fundamentals
description: A beginner's guide to understanding the basics of programming.

name: Geometry
description: Study of shapes, sizes, and properties of space.

name: Chemistry
description: An in-depth look at chemical processes and substances.

name: Web Development
description: Learn how to create and maintain websites.

name: Advanced Chemistry
description: Dive deeper into chemical reactions and molecular theory.

name: World History
description: Explore the major events and epochs in world history.

name: Machine Learning
description: Learn about algorithms and data models that computers use to perform tasks without explicit instructions.

name: Creative Writing
description: Develop skills for writing creatively and effectively.

name: Organic Gardening
description: Learn the principles of growing vegetables and herbs organically.

name: Introduction to Psychology
description: Understand the basics of human behavior and mental processes.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Design and build applications for mobile devices.

name: Classical Music Appreciation
description: Explore the history and development of classical music.

name: Modern Political Thought
description: Study the key ideas and thinkers in political theory from the 19th century to the present.

name: Fundamentals of Photography
description: Learn the basic techniques and art of photography.

name: Astrophysics for Beginners
description: An introduction to the study of the universe beyond Earth.

name: Sustainable Architecture
description: Principles and practices for designing environmentally responsible and resource-efficient buildings.

name: Digital Marketing Strategies
description: Learn effective online marketing techniques including SEO and content marketing.

name: Culinary Arts
description: Explore cooking techniques, flavors, and global cuisines.

name: Yoga and Mindfulness
description: Learn about yoga practices and mindfulness meditation for physical and mental well-being.
